_header: Sith of a womans breasts I was fostered
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, verses on enjoying what Nature gives — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Synce of a womans breestes I was fosteredDame Nature sayth I sholde
                    them LoveWhy shold any man there wyth by offendedIn generally it is
                    gevin from hym above
